articles.description: Vettaiyan: The producers behind Rajinikanth's 170th film shared a teaser which showed Rajinikanth swinging canes and slinging guns.
articles.content:
Lyca Productions on Tuesday announced that superstar Rajinikanth's 170th film is titled Vettaiyan. The Tamil film, which was announced in March, will be directed by TJ Gnanavel of Jai Bhim fame.
